data.title: Prince Narula and Yuvika Chaudhary Expecting First Child
data.meta_description: Television personalities Prince Narula and Yuvika Chaudhary have joyfully announced that they are expecting their first child. The couple shared the news on social media with a heartfelt note and a symbolic photo featuring a red toy car beside Prince's car. Prince expressed his happiness and nervousness about becoming a parent, humorously mentioning that Yuvika will now be his 'second baby.' Celebrities including Gauahar Khan, Neha Dhupia, and Anita Hassanandani extended their congratulations. Speculation about Yuvika's pregnancy had been circulating earlier this year after Prince hinted at it during a podcast appearance. The couple, who met on 'Bigg Boss 9,' married in 2018 after a long courtship.
data.text:
Television personalities Prince Narula and Yuvika Chaudhary have joyfully announced that they are expecting their first child. The couple shared the news on social media with a heartfelt note and a symbolic photo featuring a red toy car beside Prince's car. Prince expressed his happiness and nervousness about becoming a parent, humorously mentioning that Yuvika will now be his 'second baby.' Celebrities including Gauahar Khan, Neha Dhupia, and Anita Hassanandani extended their congratulations. Speculation about Yuvika's pregnancy had been circulating earlier this year after Prince hinted at it during a podcast appearance. The couple, who met on 'Bigg Boss 9,' married in 2018 after a long courtship.

447f4

Celebrities like Gauahar Khan, Neha Dhupia, and Anita Hassanandani extended congratulations to Prince Narula and Yuvika Chaudhary on their pregnancy announcement.

f4

Speculation about Yuvika Chaudhary's pregnancy had been circulating earlier this year after Prince Narula hinted at it during a podcast appearance, sparking anticipation among fans.

44

Prince Narula and Yuvika Chaudhary, who met on 'Bigg Boss 9,' got married in 2018 after a long courtship, further solidifying their relationship that began on the reality show.

47
